# NSStatusBarButton

**Class**

The appearance and behavior of an item in the systemwide menu bar.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class NSStatusBarButton
```

## Instance Properties

- **appearsDisabled**

## Menu Bar Items

- **NSStatusBar**: An object that manages a collection of status items displayed within the system-wide menu bar.
- **NSStatusItem**: An individual element displayed in the system menu bar.

## Inherits From

- NSButton
